meanings.sent1: The nonconsecutive numbers on the calendar confused me.
meanings.sent2: The students sat in nonconsecutive seats in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The nonconsecutive pages of the book made it hard to follow the story.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like nonconsecutive puzzle pieces, scattered and disconnected.
meanings.sent5: The nonconsecutive pattern of stars in the sky formed a unique shape.

meanings.definition: Not occurring one after the other.
meanings.sent1: The nonconsecutive rain showers surprised the farmers.
meanings.sent2: The nonconsecutive days off disrupted his routine.
meanings.sent3: The nonconsecutive bus stops made the commute longer than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her nonconsecutive piano notes created a jarring melody.
meanings.sent5: The nonconsecutive footsteps echoed in the empty hallway.
